name: automation-execution-report

scripts.test:web: npx cucumber-js --tags @web --config config-directory/cucumber.json && node generate-report.js || node generate-report.js
scripts.test:api: npx cucumber-js --tags @api --parallel 1 --config config-directory/cucumber.json && node generate-report.js || node generate-report.js
scripts.test:all: npx cucumber-js --config config-directory/cucumber.json  && node generate-report.js || node generate-report.js ./tests/features
scripts.test:sanity: npx cucumber-js --tags @sanity --config config-directory/cucumber.json && node generate-report.js || node generate-report.js

author: Milind G
description: Overview : This framework combines Playwright for browser automation and Cucumber.js for (BDD), enabling seamless web and API testing. The modular design ensures flexibility and scalability, offering robust testing for web applications and APIs.
